title: Metro.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Metro.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release Info:


Metro 2033




Release year : 2010
Genre : Action / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : 4A Games
Published by : THQ
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus| Multi9
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack : SKIDROW




System Requirements:
Operating system : Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD processor
with a clock frequency of 2 GHz
Memory : 1 GB (XP) / 2 GB (Vista / 7)
Video card : compatible with DirectX 9, Shader Model 3 rd
(GeForce 8800, GeForce GT220 and above)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0
Free space on hard disk : 9 GB

Game information:

2033. The whole world lies in ruins after a nuclear war,
Moscow has turned into a ghost town. The few survivors are
hiding in bomb shelters of the Moscow subway stations that
formed the city-state, created trade alliances and political
groups. The background radiation makes it impossible for a
long presence on the surface, an even greater danger is posed
by living on the surface of the mutants and by unknown creatures.

ENEA, a highly populated station on the orange subway branch,
has long been a safe. But lately it is being attacked creepy
creatures, "black", and people become more and more difficult
to repel the attack. Artem, a resident Exhibition Center,
will get to the center underground to rescue from the danger
of his house and all underground.

Go through all the horrors of the "Metro 2033" and become a
real hero of the post-apocalyptic world!

Game Features:

Try to imagine all the hardships of life underground in
constant fear. Feel resident devastated post-nuclear Moscow!

Explore the network of tunnels and the infected city of
radiation. There, in the dark, at every moment in danger
of becoming the prey of mutants. You can save only a mask
and a faithful machine.

In your arsenal will be presented as the standard models
of weapons and unique trunks handicrafts.

Always have a choice - to join the fight or circumvent the
danger, kill or spare. The fate of humanity depends on you.

Repack Features:

Metro 2033
Version of the game - the last
Do not recoded
Cut Trailer Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

Additions:

Ranger Pack



Metro: Last Light

rd (GeForce 8800 GT, GeForce GTS 250 or better (or equivalent AMD))

Game information:


In the subway tunnels beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic
Moscow the remnants of humanity reflect the deadly attack
from both outside and inside.

Mutants regularly visited by the catacombs and prey on
those who dared to get out on the lifeless surface under
the poisoned air. But instead to unite the city ÃŒÂ¶ÃŒÂ¶ metro
station constantly fighting, trying to get a doomsday
device from the military bunker D6 that can give them
absolute power. Inflames the civil war that threatens
to wipe out the last people. Your character - Artem,
consumed with guilt, but do not lose hope. Now it is
up to you to our survival in this dark hour ...

Gripping first-person shooter with a great story Metro:
Last Light Ã¢â€â‚¬ this long-awaited sequel to the cult game
Metro 2033, the critically acclaimed in 2010.

Game Features:

Enter the exciting fights exotic homemade weapons against
humans and mutants! Attack the enemies stealthily creeping
to him under the cover of darkness!

Examine the post-apocalyptic world of the Moscow Metro in
one of the most realistic and atmospheric games ever created!
Fight to the last bullet to his last breath in a terrible game,
where mixed genres Ã‚Â«survival horrorÃ‚Â» and "first person shooter"!
Through the use of next-generation technologies that provide
unparalleled coverage and realistic physics,
the game set a new benchmark as game consoles and on the PC.

Repack Features:


Metro: Last Light
Version of the game - v1.0.0.14
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
